name: The Design People
tagline: Web Design and Web Development Experts
description:
The Design People, Inc. creates business websites. We license, customize and develop websites and online marketing campaigns for companies of all sizes. Our difference is in our collaborative, creative process with a focus on client success. We offer personalized, one-on-one service through each stage of website development. We continue to partner with, support, consult and host our clients through the life of their businesses.
We have available web designers and developers now that can work on your web projects. We specialize in real estate websites, brochure sites, ecommerce and business websites. Check out our portfolio at http://thedesignpeople.com
